dialogue.speaker: Alice
dialogue.text: Hello, Bob! I'm so excited to see you!

dialogue.speaker: Bob
dialogue.text: Hey Alice! It's great to see you too! What brings you here today?

dialogue.speaker: narrator
dialogue.text: Alice and Bob were standing in front of the old oak tree, reminiscing about their childhood memories.

dialogue.speaker: Alice
dialogue.text: I remember when we used to play hide-and-seek behind this very tree! Do you still have your favorite hiding spot?

dialogue.speaker: Bob
dialogue.text: (laughs) Oh, yeah! I think I can still fit into that tight little nook. But don't tell anyone my secret!
